H3.text: In which US state is the Green Mountains Range. US-VT

A4.text: The Green Mountains are a mountain range in the U.S. state of Vermont

A5.text: The part of the same range that is in Massachusetts and Connecticut is known as the Berkshires or the Berkshire Hills
